plot: An old man is seen leaving his home in the care of his little son and daughter. His post is in the watch tower of his town, which surmounts a large old fortress. He is seen going his rounds...
title: Le veilleur de nuit
plot_es: An old man is seen leaving his home in the care of his little son and daughter. His post is in the watch tower of his town, which surmounts a large old fortress. He is seen going his rounds...
